title: King of beers font
content:
Looking for budweiser's "king of beers" font   
   
 ![king of beers](http://web.archive.org/web/20141014143904im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/70878.jpg)
author: flex

comments.content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141014143904im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/kiss.gif)   
   
_( I am sorry if it sometimes seems like I almost HAVE to ID every single sample I see.. And, I may second Yves on the 'best type identification team in the known universe' part.. You all are fabulous.. I love you all.. Soo.. Now you know it.. ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141014143904im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/bigsmile.gif) )_

Hear, hear!   
   
You know Typophile.com was mentioned in one of the recent graphics magazines a couple of months ago as one of the best places to have a font identified (it might have been HOW magazine).   
   
Ain't it the truth!?

I just assumed Dav was in the bathroom or something when that ID popped up.   
   
You wouldn't lose me anyway - I have learned more about type in the year or so since I've been hanging out here than in the previous 18 as a graphic designer.

LOL   
   
I guess if I want to play in the big leagues I need to enable email notification but if I did that I'd never get any work done.

What was all that about retiring and handing the forum over to Dav   
and that remark about speed racers in [that other thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20141014143904/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/70722.html?1114471727)? ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20141014143904im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

I really don't want to start losing valuable people here. This forum   
is the best type identification team in the known universe, bar none.   
 ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20141014143904im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
Yes, you heard it right. I meant you as well, Miss Wardle! ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141014143904im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/bigsmile.gif)

> * * *
> **quote:**
> 
> I am sorry if it sometimes seems like I almost HAVE to ID every   
> single sample I see.
> 
> * * *
> !-/quote-!\>!-quote-!\>

I think we all feel the urge, Dav. Thanks for sharing this with us. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20141014143904im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
This is suspiciously starting to sound like a Type Identiholics   
Anonymous reunion... ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141014143904im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/bigsmile.gif)

> * * *
> **quote:**
> 
> I just assumed Dav was in the bathroom or something when   
> that ID popped up.
> 
> * * *
> !-/quote-!\>!-quote-!\>

Ooooh, has Hrant been teaching you his [trademark toiletcam trick](http://web.archive.org/web/20141014143904/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/6469.html)? ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141014143904im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/bigsmile.gif)   
   
BTW This is a piece of Typophile history: the first one minute ID ever.
